rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]Self-Improver[/i] – At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose target opponent. You and that player both draw two cards and create a Food token. Until your next turn, creatures you control gain protection from permanents that player controls and can't attack that player.
[i]King of Firene[/i] – If you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 2 instead.
